name: Gresbi
tagline: Advanced web & smart mobile apps for your business
description:
We are a well-coordinated team of analysts, developers, designers and architects. We work to solve your problems, using creative thinking and advanced technologies.
In our arsenal we have a vast stack of technologies, expert team and high standards of quality. Gresbi's specialists successfully cope with tasks of various degrees of complexity: from corporate websites to high volume systems and applications.
